objects.description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has obtained code signing certificates signed by DigiCert, GlobalSign, and COMOOD for malware payloads.(Citation: DFIR Ryuk 2 Hour Speed Run November 2020)(Citation: Mandiant FIN12 Oct 2021)
